fullplot: A grandmother dies and leaves behind hours of secret film and audio recordings as well as an envelope with the words "Must read after my death", which reveal a dark history for her family to discover.
plot: A grandmother dies and leaves behind hours of secret film and audio recordings as well as an envelope with the words "Must read after my death", which reveal a dark history for her family to discover.
title: Must Read After My Death

tomatoes.consensus: Impressively constructed from home movie clips and audio recordings, Must Read After My Death is both searing and intimate.
